name: Dragon's Fire (Oekimo)
description:
A Short prototype where you play as a dragon that is attacking a village, 

Score as many points by burning down the house and the villagers in the 2 min time limit.

Controls:

Left Stick /WASD : Controls the dragons movement left and right or up and down.

A/Left Control/Mouse 1: Activates the dragons fire breath. 

Start/Enter: Opens the pause menu.

Compatible with the Tilt 5 AR system.
